content: end of round 12 cut color b leaving 6 tail for weaving in round 13 join color c in same st where last round ended chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 152 single_crochet round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to first corner in corner work 3 single_crochet *single_crochet in ea half_double_crochet to next corner in corner work 3 single_crochet repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 160 single_crochet see note about finished square size above if square measures almost 12 at this point skip rnds 15-16 and proceed with round 17 cutting color c before finishing square with final 2 rounds in color a round 15 if necessary repeat round 14 168 single_crochet round 16 if necessary repeat round 14 176 single_crochet cut color c leaving 6 tail for weaving in round 17 join color a in same st where last round ended chain 1 work one long single_crochet in next single_crochet two rnds below keeping gauge loose to prevent bunching up single_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet on current round *long single_crochet in next single_crochet two rnds below single_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet on current round repeat from * to corner in corner work 3 single_crochet single_crochet in ea of next 3 single_crochet on current round** repeat from * to ** around join with slip_stitch note try to have the same number of long single_crochet on ea side of square fudging a bit if necessary round 18 chain 1 single_crochet in ea long single_crochet and ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch and fasten_off block square as needed go team copyright 2017 2013 revised 2002 kathy north -- www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes
